sentences.en: An English teacher's life is disrupted when a former student returns to her small town after failing as a playwright in New York.
sentences.cn: 以前的一个学生时，返回失败后，她的小城镇作为一个剧作家在纽约的一名英语教师的生活被打乱。

sentences.en: Bernard Show was the foremost playwright of his time.
sentences.cn: 萧伯纳是他那个时代最重要的戏剧作家.

sentences.en: Famous playwright Mr MOK Chiu - yu ( left ) at a guest lecture.
sentences.cn: 著名剧作家 莫昭如 先生 ( 左 ) 主持客席讲座.

sentences.en: Greek playwright back in 500 BC. Many historians consider him the father of Greek tragedies.
sentences.cn: 公元前500年时的希腊剧作家。许多历史学家认为他是希腊悲剧之父。

sentences.en: Gwyn Thomas was a famous playwright.
sentences.cn: 格温·托马斯是著名的剧作家.

sentences.en: He is a novelist and playwright from South Wales.
sentences.cn: 他是南威尔士的一名小说家和剧作家.

sentences.en: He was also a philosopher, Christian apologist, playwright, and poet.
sentences.cn: 他还是一位哲学家 、 护教家 、 剧作家和诗人.

sentences.en: His plays have been translated into every major living language and are performed more often than those of any other playwright.
sentences.cn: 他的剧本被翻译成所有主要使用着的语言，并且表演次数远远超过其他任何剧作家。

sentences.en: I consider him the - uh - the greatest playwright,'said Hsin - mei , taking a wild guess.
sentences.cn: 辛楣 瞎猜道:“我认为他是最 —— 呃 —— 最伟大的戏剧家. ”

sentences.en: It was an age when the actor and the producer counted for more than the playwright.
sentences.cn: 在那个时代,演员和演出主持人远比剧作家重要.

sentences.en: J . B . Priestley ( 1894 -- 1984 ), British novelist, playwright, and essayist.
sentences.cn: K约翰-伯因顿-普里斯特利 ( 1894-1984 ), 英国小说家, 剧作家和散文家.

sentences.en: Miller used to dine out on his popularity as a playwright.
sentences.cn: 米勒过去常靠着他剧作家的声望被邀赴宴.

sentences.en: The playwright does something remarkable in this scene, but without any impression of straining after an effect.
sentences.cn: 剧作家在这场中有许多惊人妙笔，但并不给人留下竭力追求表面效果的印象。

sentences.en: The playwright fleshed out his characters.
sentences.cn: 剧作家将他的人物写得栩栩如生.

sentences.en: The playwright often fails to flesh out his characters.
sentences.cn: 剧作家往往不能使笔下的人物栩栩如生.

sentences.en: The playwright Oscar Wilde was noted for his epigrams.
sentences.cn: 剧作家奥斯卡.王尔德以他的诙谐短诗着称.

sentences.en: The playwright pruned his play of what he thought was irrelevant.
sentences.cn: 那位剧作家从他的剧本中删去他认为不相干的部分.

sentences.en: The playwright was slaughtered by the press.
sentences.cn: 这位剧作家受到新闻界的无情批判.

sentences.en: The playwright, the set designer, the wardrobe lady, all get credit.
sentences.cn: 剧作家, 布景设计者, 服装师, 大家都应得到荣誉.
